title: Having FPS Issues
body: I have a NVIDIA GeForce GT 540M, playing on very low quality, 1366x768 res, aa and vsync off and I sit on 15-20fps during my games, if Idled, I get around 150fps. Why is that? Could anyone help please, thanks :)

replies.body:
Hey there,

Run through [this support article](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-troubleshooting) and let me know if anything helps.
